titleStmt.title: The royal wanton containing the Gallick intriegues [sic], with Lycogenes (late King of Albion) his expedition for Hibernia: being the second volume of the Amours of Messalina, with Polydorus, K. of the Goths. Compleating the whole history. By a woman of quality, a late confidant of Queen Messalina.
Amours of Messalina late Queen of Albion. Part 5.
titleStmt.author: Woman of quality, fl. 1689-1690.
Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F.B. and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: The fifth in a series of five satires on Mary of Modena, consort of James II.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
